titles.title: National Climate Service Corps and Careers Network Act of 2021

A bill to amend the National and Community Service Act of 1990 to establish a national climate service corps to help communities withstand and respond to changes in the Earth's climate with respect to natural disasters, and for other purposes.
National Climate Service Corps and Careers Network Act of 2021

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary:
National Climate Service Corps and Careers Network Act of 2021
This bill establishes the Climate Resiliency Service Corps as a national service program to assist communities in mitigating the effects climate change and establishes the Climate Careers Network to connect individuals with jobs in green industries.
